resources.string: This App will forward your SMS to your Email
Enter email to forward your sms
Enter sender whose sms you want to forward

This App will forward your text message to your email. You need to provide your gmail account credentials which will be used to send the mail. Gmail client has to be installed in your phone. Along with that specify the receiver email address and the sender sms origin that you want to forward. Currently only one sms origin and one receiver is supported.
